rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entry with ramp and automatic door system.
Spacious Mediterranean style living room with high ceilings and exposed brick accent walls. Features large windows facing south for natural light per Vastu principles.
Adjacent to the kitchen and living room with a seamless transition to open space, designed to allow wheelchair access.
Modern Mediterranean kitchen designed for wheelchair accessibility with lower countertops and an island. Includes storage solutions conforming to local building norms.
Multi-purpose room serving as guest bedroom during visits or permanent servant quarters with integrated bathroom facilities. Equipped with wheelchair-accessible features.
A dedicated private gym area that is easily accessible from the ground floor for all residents, featuring low-impact equipment and ample space for wheelchair maneuverability.
Space for storage, laundry and utility connections, designed with accessibility in mind.

openings.accessibility: Wheelchair accessible with automatic door system
Large, low threshold for wheelchair passage.
